rule: The input text provided to the chatbot will always be a string representing a news article.
input: Innovations in renewable energy are accelerating the green transition.
validityText:
The provided input consists of a single sentence: "Innovations in renewable energy are accelerating the green transition." According to the input specification, the input must be a string containing the text of a complete news article suitable for classification into specified categories. Since the input does not represent a full news article but rather a brief statement, it does not comply with the specification.
